title: Highest-Ranking Muslim German Official Says Terrorist Attacks Bolster Discrimination
teaser: Aydan Ã–zoguz, Germany's federal commissioner for migration and refugees, is the highest-ranking Muslim in the German government. She says she is frustrated by the way terrorist incidents drive wedges between different groups in Germany.
